# Kryten UserStats Service Dependencies
# Tracks user statistics via NATS events

# Core dependency - kryten-py library for CyTube/NATS integration
kryten-py>=0.4.0

# HTTP client for API requests
aiohttp>=3.9.0

# kryten-py brings these transitive dependencies:
# - nats-py>=2.9.0 (NATS messaging)
# - pydantic>=2.0.0 (data validation)
